name: CLKImageProvider
desc: An image displayed by a complication.

items.name: init(onePieceImage: UIImage)
items.desc: Creates and returns an image provider with the specified one-piece image.

items.name: init(onePieceImage: UIImage, twoPieceImageBackground: UIImage?, twoPieceImageForeground: UIImage?)
items.desc: Creates and returns an image provider with both one-piece and two-piece images.

items.name: var onePieceImage: UIImage
items.desc: The template image to use as a one-piece image.

items.name: var tintColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The tint color to apply to the image in a multicolor clock face.

items.name: var twoPieceImageBackground: UIImage?
items.desc: The background image in a two-piece image.

items.name: var twoPieceImageForeground: UIImage?
items.desc: The foreground image in a two-piece image.

items.name: var accessibilityLabel: String?
items.desc: A succinct label that succinctly identifies the purpose of the image.
